Text:
First off, thank you so much! I'm so in love with this song & i was worried i wouldn't be able to find a dl for it, let alone such a perfect quality dl!

Second, for anyone wanting to know:

Quality - 10/Perfect! [Seriously, it sounds flawless, but don't take my word for it, check it out for yourself.]
Song - 10/Perfect [And btw, I'm not one of these little teen/pre-teen girls. I'm 23 and i think One Direction has real talent, so please... no nasty comments alright!]
Oh & NishLakhani- Any chance you will be uploading the full album when it's released?

No worries..!
And yh,
I will..!!
:)
Great, i can't wait to download it!!
